rows.label: qst103601_msg0001
rows.name:
They wouldn't have them
in shops, I guess...

rows.label: qst103601_msg0002
rows.name:
My friend's moving away, so I
wanted to make him a pendant
like one that I saw in a book.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0003
rows.name: What a charming idea.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm sure a little keepsake
like that will soften the
pain of parting a little.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0005
rows.name:
Indeed. It's like how we keep
journals, so that it's not so
bad when we lose our memories.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0006
rows.name:
I only wish I had some records
of my time with the Emperor.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0007
rows.name:
It was very sudden, what happened
to you. It's a shame, but there's
not much we could do.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0008
rows.name:
Though Meleph-sama and I
will of course tell you
what we know of your past.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0009
rows.name:
At least once our journey is over,
you should be able to get to know
His Majesty all over again.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0010
rows.name: Indeed...

rows.label: qst103601_msg0011
rows.name:
Tell me, young lady... What kind
of pendant did you have in mind?

rows.label: qst103601_msg0012
rows.name:
I wanted to make one with some of
the Rosary Moss from the World
Tree. They say it brings luck!

rows.label: qst103601_msg0013
rows.name:
But, they don't sell it
in any of the shops...

rows.label: qst103601_msg0014
rows.name:
You want to make your friend
both happy and fortunate then?

rows.label: qst103601_msg0015
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: qst103601_msg0016
rows.name:
He said he has to move away
because his mother died...

rows.label: qst103601_msg0017
rows.name: So I just want him to be happy.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0018
rows.name: That is a sad loss...

rows.label: qst103601_msg0019
rows.name:
My friends...if it is all right with
you all, I would like to help this
girl to obtain what she requires.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0020
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0021
rows.name:
I promise to get what
you need, my child.

rows.label: qst103601_msg0022
rows.name: Really? Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst103601_msg0023
rows.name:
I'd be so grateful if I
could have it in time to
make it before he goes...
